nodes.text: @KissMyAssCommie @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw No, I see someone carrying around shit like this and accuse them of being ultra nationalist. https://t.co/l786dATPTi
@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw I’m not a Trumper, so I wouldn’t carry that or hang it out front of my home. How would you feel about a Biden/Harris sign on someone’s lawn?

@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw I didn’t say silencing anyone was ok! You sure like to put words in other peoples mouths 🤡 Is racism wrong? Yes! Is hate speech wrong? Yes! You clowns see someone with an American flag and accuse them of being “ultra nationalist” and fascist. Stop deflecting.
@KissMyAssCommie @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Oh so you're OK for silencing racist speech but that's not cool with you because it's fascist?  Which one is it?
@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Did I say that? Because that’s definitely not OK. Racism is never OK.

@KissMyAssCommie @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw People are free to say whatever they want, that doesn't mean there aren't consequences to what you say.  If you think it's okay for a racist white man to call a black man the N word, then you have real problem.
@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Suppression of speech is a fascist tactic.
@KissMyAssCommie @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Yeah I don't think you know what that word even means...
@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Obviously you don’t 🤡
@EpidemiologistU @olson_curt @StefanMychajliw And you’re engaging in fascism when you try to silence anyone 🤡

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw You’re missing the point that there is no us and them.  Fasicists, racists, and white supremacists are not be debated, argued with, have a voice.  They need to be held accountable for their actions, and just go.  Watchmen and Proud Boys have ZERO purpose in this country.

Hypocrisy of the left and radical progressives is astounding. Silence is deafening on racism claim. Democratic Party Boss accused of telling an African American woman she "doesn't look like a Sheriff." No outcry or even a statement from elected officials. Do they believe her?
@StefanMychajliw Think about how exciting your upcoming career as third-shift manager at 7-11 will be! Free Slurpees and roller dogs, moobs!

@StefanMychajliw Sounds like bullshit, which is right up your alley! Get some media hacks to repeat the lies and roll on! Dodge interviews, skip work, lie repeatedly and get crushed in November! Resign!
@HoratioSeymour @StefanMychajliw https://t.co/gtBBFbR5fQ
@StefanMychajliw Don't equate "the left" with the Democratic Party. "Democratic Party Boss" doesn't speak for us.\n\nFuck the democrats, fuck the republicans, and, most of all, fuck you.

@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw You don't have a clue there are massive swaths of Americans who don't approach approach those extremes. Yet, you conveniently miss the extremes on the left.
@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw We are getting absolutely nowhere and it’s clear you don’t understand.  I’m going to go enjoy my night, and stop going in circles with you.
@olson_curt @EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw Hey Stefan ... the caliber of the people who are trying to defend your buffoonery should tell you something about the caliber of your own character.
@brtnhll77 @olson_curt @EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw https://t.co/bNYNRmeIls
@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw The very words you write are oozing with an enemy's list,  the very definition of Us vs. Them.

@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw You simply don't get that I'm talking broadly, not specifically. Your rhetoric is just one of countless others in the USA where people feel entitled to "go after" & maintain Us vs. Them, with no end in sight.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Again you act like Stefan deserves some form of respect or say in the matter.  He doesn’t.  He is a horrible person, and he needs to just go away never to be heard from again.

@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw I offer your comments as just the latest Exhibit A as to where we are & why things aren't changing anytime soon. You fail to see the problem with your own mindset. It is as toxic as those you are criticizing.

@StefanMychajliw It was on the front page of the paper and on all local news stations. The statement, if true,  was universally condemned by the party and voters. I don't think hypocrisy means what you think it means. https://t.co/G9LZvwyVXm
@CerealBus_WNY @StefanMychajliw Cerealbus Woke up on wrong side of bed today I see....?
@newcongress2 @StefanMychajliw No, I'm just a salty motherfucker.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw I don’t react emotionally.  I’m on the ground screaming Black Lives Matter, calling out Watchmen and Proud Boys, saying no to fascism.  I don’t hide behind a screen.  People like Stefan don’t get a discussion, he needs to go.  If he died, this city would be a better place.
@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw Silence & "hate" are not the only options. Countless folks just react emotionally. That is adding nothing to public discourse or adding to any accountability.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw If you honestly think being quiet and saying nothing is the best way to handle this, then I’m sorry but you’re horribly wrong.  When I watched January 6th on my TV, I made a promise that, that would never happen again.  I’m not going to back down, I’m not going to play nice.
@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw If you equate my comments w/being silent, you really haven't been paying attention to the endless child-like behavior we've been getting in politics for decades.
@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw We have enough "hate" in American politics. The adults act like 12 yos who can't get along in a sandbox. And their tribes just cheer them on--all the time.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw Stefan is an incompetent, unintelligent, zero skilled human being who is a leech of a politician.  He never works and collects salary, he friends far right groups like Watchmen and Proud Boys, and he deserves all the hate he brings on himself.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw I don’t just pick on Republicans...  Andrew Cuomo going around sexually assaulting people is disgusting and he needs to go.  Byron Brown has shown to be incompetent, and the Democrats in Erie Country are refusing challengers.  I call bullshit when I see it.

@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw You can spend time into eternity making these moral equivalencies in politics. All it does is create more Us v. Them. It does nothing, except for the folks doing so to beat their chest and prove their brilliance. Both parties have displayed enough incompetence.

@olson_curt @StefanMychajliw So what is the point of your comment then?  What did it accomplish to reply to me?  If you claim to be a hardcore Christian don’t you think it’s ridiculous that our politician here was boinking someone behind his wife’s back?  He’s a horrible person.  He has no moral high ground.
@EpidemiologistU @StefanMychajliw I don't live there. The point: we see these moral equivalencies in our politics all the time. The donkeys & elephants have proven time & again to be incompetent.
